name: 蒂羅森紫花詠Tirosens thistle-中文版
name_original: 蒂羅森紫花詠Tirosens thistle-中文版
description:
Tirosens Thistle is a 2D turn-based role-playing Japanese-style RPG game.



The game is set in Taiwan during 1990-1992. After completing the initial main storyline, the player will enter an open game world that simulates the coast of Chiayi to the Alishan region spanning the entire Chiayi administrative area, allowing for free exploration.





The player-controlled protagonist will primarily solve various puzzles and acquire equipment to strengthen themselves and their allies throughout the game. They will also collect various skills and meet allies with unique characteristics. By freely combining their skills, they can tailor the protagonist's role in the team according to their preferences and assemble their own team for adventure. The goal is to investigate the true identity of the black gang members who are terrorizing their village, and explore the protagonist's grandfather's past experiences and the history of their hometown, Chiayi.



*Please note that the game is currently only available in Taiwanese and there is no English version yet.
